appNameLong.description: The name of the application (long version)

appDescription.message: Find In Google Serp (FIGS) is an easy to use extension to get the position of a website in Google Results

errorNotInIncognito.message: Please use me only in incognito mode for accurate results!

errorPositionNotification.message: There was an error while trying to get the position.

successPositionNotification.message: The position of $domain$ for the keyword has been saved in the clipboard.
